attributes.action: call on Post Office Ltd not to close Post Offices in Waltham Forest.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Waltham Forest Council believes that local post offices are vital to strong city communities and is wholly opposed to the planned closure of six of Waltham Forest’s twenty-one sub-post offices.

Local post offices provide vital services in our community, particularly for older people and people living in poverty.
attributes.creator_name: Councillors Clyde Loakes, Keith Rayner and Matt Davis

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "call on Post Office Ltd not to close Post Offices in Waltham Forest."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15911.asp

Prime Minister's Office
